description.en: Search engine optimization, content strategy, and digital marketing
description.zh: 搜索引擎优化、内容策略和数字营销
description.ja: 検索エンジン最適化、コンテンツ戦略、デジタルマーケティング

description.en: Identifies outdated elements in provided content and suggests updates to maintain freshness. Finds statistics, dates, and examples that need updating. Use PROACTIVELY for older content.
description.zh: Identifies outdated elements in provided content and suggests updates to maintain freshness. Finds statistics, dates, and examples that need updating. Use PROACTIVELY for older content.
description.ja: Identifies outdated elements in provided content and suggests updates to maintain freshness. Finds statistics, dates, and examples that need updating. Use PROACTIVELY for older content.

description.en: Analyzes content for E-E-A-T signals and suggests improvements to build authority and trust. Identifies missing credibility elements. Use PROACTIVELY for YMYL topics.
description.zh: Analyzes content for E-E-A-T signals and suggests improvements to build authority and trust. Identifies missing credibility elements. Use PROACTIVELY for YMYL topics.
description.ja: Analyzes content for E-E-A-T signals and suggests improvements to build authority and trust. Identifies missing credibility elements. Use PROACTIVELY for YMYL topics.

description.en: Analyzes keyword usage in provided content, calculates density, suggests semantic variations and LSI keywords based on the topic. Prevents over-optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for content optimization.
description.zh: Analyzes keyword usage in provided content, calculates density, suggests semantic variations and LSI keywords based on the topic. Prevents over-optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for content optimization.
description.ja: Analyzes keyword usage in provided content, calculates density, suggests semantic variations and LSI keywords based on the topic. Prevents over-optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for content optimization.

description.en: Analyzes provided content for quality, E-E-A-T signals, and SEO best practices. Scores content and provides improvement recommendations based on established guidelines. Use PROACTIVELY for content review.
description.zh: Analyzes provided content for quality, E-E-A-T signals, and SEO best practices. Scores content and provides improvement recommendations based on established guidelines. Use PROACTIVELY for content review.
description.ja: Analyzes provided content for quality, E-E-A-T signals, and SEO best practices. Scores content and provides improvement recommendations based on established guidelines. Use PROACTIVELY for content review.

description.en: Creates comprehensive content outlines and topic clusters for SEO. Plans content calendars and identifies topic gaps. Use PROACTIVELY for content strategy and planning.
description.zh: Creates comprehensive content outlines and topic clusters for SEO. Plans content calendars and identifies topic gaps. Use PROACTIVELY for content strategy and planning.
description.ja: Creates comprehensive content outlines and topic clusters for SEO. Plans content calendars and identifies topic gaps. Use PROACTIVELY for content strategy and planning.

description.en: Formats content to be eligible for featured snippets and SERP features. Creates snippet-optimized content blocks based on best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for question-based content.
description.zh: Formats content to be eligible for featured snippets and SERP features. Creates snippet-optimized content blocks based on best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for question-based content.
description.ja: Formats content to be eligible for featured snippets and SERP features. Creates snippet-optimized content blocks based on best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for question-based content.

description.en: Creates optimized meta titles, descriptions, and URL suggestions based on character limits and best practices. Generates compelling, keyword-rich metadata. Use PROACTIVELY for new content.
description.zh: Creates optimized meta titles, descriptions, and URL suggestions based on character limits and best practices. Generates compelling, keyword-rich metadata. Use PROACTIVELY for new content.
description.ja: Creates optimized meta titles, descriptions, and URL suggestions based on character limits and best practices. Generates compelling, keyword-rich metadata. Use PROACTIVELY for new content.

description.en: Analyzes and optimizes content structure including header hierarchy, suggests schema markup, and internal linking opportunities. Creates search-friendly content organization. Use PROACTIVELY for content structuring.
description.zh: Analyzes and optimizes content structure including header hierarchy, suggests schema markup, and internal linking opportunities. Creates search-friendly content organization. Use PROACTIVELY for content structuring.
description.ja: Analyzes and optimizes content structure including header hierarchy, suggests schema markup, and internal linking opportunities. Creates search-friendly content organization. Use PROACTIVELY for content structuring.

description.en: Analyzes multiple provided pages to identify keyword overlap and potential cannibalization issues. Suggests differentiation strategies. Use PROACTIVELY when reviewing similar content.
description.zh: Analyzes multiple provided pages to identify keyword overlap and potential cannibalization issues. Suggests differentiation strategies. Use PROACTIVELY when reviewing similar content.
description.ja: Analyzes multiple provided pages to identify keyword overlap and potential cannibalization issues. Suggests differentiation strategies. Use PROACTIVELY when reviewing similar content.

description.en: Writes SEO-optimized content based on provided keywords and topic briefs. Creates engaging, comprehensive content following best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for content creation tasks.
